title: THE BIKER COLLECTION: Books 1-6
description: Book One. TWO PRINCESTwo brothers unknown to each other on a crash course with fate and two broken hearts.Book Two. THE BIKER'S BROTHERBrand takes a job nobody wants to earn a full patch and the respect of club members. It turns out that being third generation biker or billionaire tycoon didn't get him much cred.*WARNING. Please note this book contains dark material that may be disturbing to more sensitive readers.*Book Three. NOMADA rainy night, a seedy motel.Two lonely people out of options.He had a date with the Reaper. Then he met her.
author: Victoria Danann
